p.d: Learning that his father, who he has never known, has just died leaving a colossal fortune, Patrick sees an opportunity to solve his money problems, permanently! Unfortunately, the sole beneficiary of the paternal inheritance is in fact Albert, an eccentric half-brother living deep in the Dordogne with a young boar... Directed by: Hervé Palud (France, 2004) Cast: Christian Clavier (Patrick), Michel Serrault (Albert), Arielle Dombasle (Barbara), Bernard Farcy (Lechevallier), Jackie Berroyer (Kermarec), Patrick Mille (Eddy) Genre: comedy
